reporter_caption.center: COOPER FARMS v. BROWN BROWN, 113 Ohio St.3d 1443 (2007)

caption.center: Cooper Farms, Inc. v. Brown Brown of Ohio, Inc.

opinion.opinion_text:
Appeals not Accepted for Review Discretionary appeal not accepted.
PFEIFER, J., dissents.
O'CONNOR, J., dissents and would accept the appeal on Proposition of Law No. I.
On motion for admission pro hac vice of Richard A. Buchanan, Andrew C. Jacobson, and K. Clark Shriley by Kevin H. Taylor. Motion granted.
